name: The Last Skatepark
description:
You have to save the Last Skatepark in the universe using your skateboard.  The robots are trying to destroy it!

It contains a nice voice acted intro and some nice features that you will discover if you give it a try. 

I'm Rhomita and I enjoyed very much to make this game. if you are curious how I did it, you can see the whole process in my Twitch channel:  https://www.twitch.tv/rhomita

Game developed for a GameJam in 48 hours. The theme is "Deck", and basically the skateboard contains a Deck :)

Controls:

  • Mouse left click: Throw skate
  • Mouse right click: Ride skate
  • 'e': Take skate.
